title: SOLD   Old Mill Sally League T206's x28
author: Ladder7

posts.post_title: SOLD   Old Mill Sally League T206's x28
posts.post_content:
Once in a great while, the old "dead uncle" story does pan out!
Today, the recent Beantown find produces this lot. 

All appear vg-ex, though I may have missed a minor crease. Some have a back stamp, which is likely not significant.

All I can guarantee, these are authentic and look terrific. sorry. 

Ive got big mutha images, but you may have to wait. We got David taming Goliath, alone over here and she Still wants me to vacuum!

Entire lot only... Make an email offer. Tanx, Steve 

[url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

Whoever bought this collection, please contact me.  There are 4 cards that I am really interested in.   Tried to contact the original seller to no avail.

I am ready to make a generous deal............
